About the Company: Pasupati Fincap Limited is a `Non-Banking Financial Company` within the purview of the Non-Banking Financial Companies (Reserve Bank) Directions, 1977. The Company has been incorporated mainly with the object of hire-purchase, bill discounting, dealing in securities and other similar and related activities. The Company also plans to provide the merchant banking advisory services, execute placement of debt and equity instruments, issue management services and other fund based investments in the primary market.The companys business activities includes hire purchase. The company is suspended from the BSE on account of non-compliance with listing agreement clauses.
